item.title: The Tribe of Diira
item.description: Overview The Diira were a late neolithic tribe of minikin native to the mediterranean regions of southern Tseireph in the 2nd realm, belonging to the Nethic culture.

item.title: The Tribe of Mora
item.description: Overview The Mora were a late neolithic tribe of pastoralist-nomadic minikin native to the steppes of Tseireph in the 2nd realm, belonging to the Morellic culture.
